ch0205_00_lesoir/0101_0701_02_10: C-could I ask you a f-favor?
ch0205_00_lesoir/7101_0701_01_10:
M-my specialty at the Battle Maison is
Double Battles...
ch0205_00_lesoir/7101_0701_02_10:
So working together with other Pokémon is
something I’m good at...
ch0205_00_lesoir/7101_0701_03_10:
B-but I’m not sure if I could be on a team apart
from my sisters...
ch0205_00_lesoir/7105_0701_01_10:
Uh...umm... P-please come visit the Battle Maison
someday, if it suits your fancy.
ch0205_00_lesoir/7105_0701_02_10:
That is...if you ever get the chance to visit Kalos
or Hoenn.
ch0205_00_lesoir/7105_0701_03_10:
If you do, p-please come and challenge me to a
Double Battle...
ch0205_00_lesoir/1701_0702_01_10: I hope it isn’t too much of a burden...
ch0205_00_lesoir/2501_0701_01_10:
I hear that there are Trainers here on Pasio who
like Double Battles...and have distinct ways of
speaking...
ch0205_00_lesoir/2501_0701_03_10: How in the world will I set myself apart here?
ch0205_00_lesoir/2501_0701_04_10:
Or rather...maybe I should apologize for being
like them!
ch0205_00_lesoir/2501_0702_01_10:
Um...when I go to apologize, I think I should
bring a little something as a gift.
ch0205_00_lesoir/2501_0702_02_10:
Do you think I should take some Lava Cookies? Or
a Lumiose Galette?
ch0205_00_lesoir/3001_0701_01_10:
You’re already working so hard this morning!
U-um, I think that’s fine, though!
ch0205_00_lesoir/3003_0701_01_10: U-umm... Could we maybe have lunch together?
ch0205_00_lesoir/3005_0701_01_10:
G-good evening! I’m working at doing better with
greetings! I promise!
